dialogue.introduction: Sendai has arrived. Please leave the night battle to me.
dialogue.library_intro: I am the culmination of the 5500-ton light cruisers, the Sendai-class. I'll fully teach you the appeal of a mature light cruiser. Of course, it'll be with a night battle!
dialogue.secretary2: Come on, don't be so impatient. The night is long, you know?
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, thanks for the hard work. You're tired from the constant night battles, right? Yeah, I understand!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hm? I-It's not like I'm getting bored or anything, because I'm not! Really!
dialogue.secretarymarried: The night is great, yup. Ah! You're also pretty good, Admiral ♡ Tonight, shall we... night battle?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, what's up? You're all red... O~ho, you wanna have a night battle with me?
dialogue.show_players_score: It looks like there's a letter for admiral!
dialogue.equipment1: Ain't this good! It's great~ This kind of thing. I love it~♪
dialogue.equipment2: With this, I can go hard at night battles again.
dialogue.supply: Supplies are absolutely necessary for night battles!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Morning, huh... I'm going to rest for a little while.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: As expected, I'm dead tired... I'll just head into the docks for a bit, okay?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned. I wonder how the results are?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: You must night battle, okay? Promise?
dialogue.mvp: This is the expected outcome. It's fine, it's fine. You don't need to praise me so much.
dialogue.sunk: I wanted to... go wild... at night some more....
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Rainy Season huh? I don't like it because my outfit will rust. Well, whatever! I guess rain or no rain does not matter for night battles.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Summertime! Hurray! The season for night battles! Admiral, let's night battle, night battle! Hurry and let's nightー baーttle!
dialogue.fall_event_2015: Sendai reporting in! I'll show you how the Third Torpedo Squadron fights!
